column6: "Back in Black," Part 1 Look what someone found in their closet!  Reeling in the aftermath of the Civil War that's wracked the Marvel Universe, Peter Parker has got plenty of reasons to consider a change of wardrobe.  Black is his state of mind.  But the worst is yet to come for Spider-Man. Get on board here, True Believer, as we gear up for an event that will forever change the life of your favorite web-slinger. There IS no going back. 32 PGS./Rated A ...$2.99
column8: | penciller (cover):Ron Garney | writer:Stan Lee | colorist:Matt Milla | letterer:Cory Petit | inker:Bill Reinhold
